p: The present study was carried out in the months of October and November of 2017 and 2018, after the monsoon season. During two previous study trips (2015â€“2016) contacts were made with the local community in order to gather information on his daily habits, work, and relationship with the natural environment. Ethnobotanical and ethnomedicinal data on plants has been collected by interviewing 32 informants from the different villages of the study area.
